title: Software Composition Analysis and SBOMs: A United Defense
author: Aaron Linskens
description: Adopting both SCA and SBOM management exemplifies a best-practice approach for secure and efficient development in the face of rising cyberthreats.
cntitle: 软件成分分析和 SBOM：联合防御
cndescription: 采用 SCA 和 SBOM 管理体现了在网络威胁日益增多的情况下，安全高效开发的最佳实践方法。
